channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Three generations of the same family need help from Jules Hudson to find them a new, rural Norfolk home. In the kitty is ?800,000 for a four-bedroom house, an annexe for Granny and enough land for a Shetland pony. Jules also needs a keen eye to spot some of the world's rarest species of deer and antelope at a local safari park.
